title: Something in My Room
overview: Pat, a young man who has to wander around, follows his mother to create a new life. to house number 88, a house that makes Pat feel that he is not alone between his mother and him. Strange events unfold. After trying to find answers, Pat meets Phop, a cheeky young spirit who seeks help to help Pat find his lost identity in the afterlife of time. There were only 49 days left before being stranded on this earth as a perpetual suffering. Their love is slowly growing... together with the search for clues to fill the void of identity completely.
